name: CRISIS ROOM
description:
The government brings together the world's most capable available superheroes to save the world from a mysterious assailant.

Will Rocket Woman save the day? Will Bee Man get his honey? And what does Plexiglass Girl actually do? 

Made for the Tasting Room Jam, and it will be late! But we hope to have it done in time for the stream we ran out of time, but we managed to get a demo of the first scene up \o/.

Mouse or arrow keys to move the cursor, left mouse button or 'Z' to advance text and talk to people.
